mapper.select: select /*sangaMemberMapper - getMember*/ seq , store_id , email , pw , reg_dt from sanga_member where email=#{email}
mapper.insert: insert into sanga_member ( /*sangaMemberMapper - insertMember*/ SEQ, EMAIL, PW, REG_DT ) VALUES ( (select SEQ_VAL from sanga_seq ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY where SEQ_NAME = 'sangaMem_seq'), #{email}, #{pw}, NOW() )
